alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 3:09AM PST until December 07 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations 6 to 10 inches west of Highway 395 and up to 4 inches east of Highway 395, except 12 to 18 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 90 mph along the ridges. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and heavy snow rates may produce localized white out conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
